TopicTitle: [1.12.X] Tantares - Stockalike Soyuz and MIR [16.1][28.05.2024][{Proton Revamp]

Articles.Content:
okay: bobcat has redone the Soyuz. take a look here : http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/81754-Release-BobCat-Ind-Space-Planet-products

EDIT: took bobcat's Soyuz for a testride

-stillmistakes on the eninges for the lifter Rocket (missing verniernozzles on boosters, wrong angle of nozzles of second stange)

-shape of the enginehousing for the Servicemodule not right

-RCS very well done to be realistic on Soyuz TMA

so Beale, if you want a realistic RCS configuration for your Tantares, look at Bobcats Soyuz TMA .... but i still like the Kerberlversion of it in the current version because you can easly use the twoway RCSports for other spacecrafts (like proves and satelites or microlanders)

Edited July 4, 2014 by Darth Lazarus

okay: bobcat has redone the Soyuz. take a look here : http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/81754-Release-BobCat-Ind-Space-Planet-products

EDIT: took bobcat's Soyuz for a testride

-stillmistakes on the eninges for the lifter Rocket (missing verniernozzles on boosters, wrong angle of nozzles of second stange)

-shape of the enginehousing for the Servicemodule not right

-RCS very well done to be realistic on Soyuz TMA

so Beale, if you want a realistic RCS configuration for your Tantares, look at Bobcats Soyuz TMA .... but i still like the Kerberlversion of it in the current version because you can easly use the twoway RCSports for other spacecrafts (like proves and satelites or microlanders)

Hi!

I'll check out bobcat's when I can.

The current 2-way RCS ports will remain. But they will have a better mesh hopefully (still low-profile).

hey Beale! first of all i wish a nice weekend

so the small tiny 2-way RCS port will stay? YAY ! perfect i love teh low profil and the overall look of it. it's still kerbal like but very unique. and teh game neeeeeds more RCS ports (wich look like stock)

You really think?

Could you elaborate a little bit?

It's not that I'm too picky, but it becomes really something similar to HGR's pods.

I do like Tantares for its' design - stylish, plain, minimalist, nice. It's really to my taste.

Btw. would be nice to be able to build unmanned transportation ship (Progress-M like).

Edited July 4, 2014 by Horus
additional info

It's not that I'm too picky, but it becomes really something similar to HGR's pods.

I do like Tantares for its' design - stylish, plain, minimalist, nice. It's really to my taste.

Btw. would be nice to be able to build unmanned transportation ship (Progress-M like).

Well, each to their own I suppose, the old Tantares won't be over-written by the new one (different naming conventions), so it can still be used .

I would argue the newer design is even more minimalist than the old one, much fewer "panel lines" about.

I imagined the comparisons to HGR would be made when adding the circular windows, but it is unavoidable really, I still think it is different enough, with the style, shape, colour (and probably the biggest distinction, smaller).

I greatly admire the Soy-Juice and OrionKermin has been incredibly helpful with assistance and modding support, so I'd hate to be treading on anyone's work.

Regardless, thanks for feedback!

Progress!No I mean on the Soyuz, there hasn't been any progress on the Progress.

Forgot the damn RCS ports!

Can serve as backup propulsion.

Really would like a flag decal on the body, if I can figure it out...

is Neptune the name for the TKS?

also, from what I saw in the earlier photos, I think that the back part of the TKS should be at more of an angle.

is Neptune the name for the TKS?

also, from what I saw in the earlier photos, I think that the back part of the TKS should be at more of an angle.

Hi!

The Neptune is the panel used in the real Soyuz!

Current IVA WIP

You are right on the TKS angle for the OMS, it has been tweaked a bit, using schematic drawings to get it close to perfect.

Also for the TKS I settled on the name for as "Alnair"

Really would like a flag decal on the body, if I can figure it out...

They're supposed to be easy enough, you just need a named transform that's a textured something (not necessarily a quad even) and MODULE { name = FlagDecal textureQuadName = thatTransformName }

They're supposed to be easy enough, you just need a named transform that's a textured something (not necessarily a quad even) and MODULE { name = FlagDecal textureQuadName = thatTransformName }

Makes sense (I was trying something stupid) I'll give it a go when I can.

Can I just say you are an absolute star Mihara, I just finished the new IVA and your props are beautiful!

OH MY GOG THAT LOOKS FANTASTIC!

do the flags work on the neptune?

OH MY GOG THAT LOOKS FANTASTIC!

do the flags work on the neptune?

Oh you bet they do

I'll try a more unique flag in another screenshot to demonstrate...

EDIT:

Here, you see the EXT. camera function and see the flag function, the lever on the door also allow EVA.

Two MFDs alone might be restricting to some, but it fits well I think. And hey, the real Soyuz pilots make do with it!

Hi & Thanks!

Only the Orbital Module IVA remains, I did the crew module IVA in a couple of hours, so that shouldn't be too much.

As long as people don't mind the new Tantares having identical stats to the old Tantares, then not long!

Oh, also the OM will now only seat one. I think this makes more sense for balance.

Thank you for the kind words.

A 3-seat Soyuz is doubtful, unless I moved up the size scale.

To fit three in the capsule and still have instruments panel is literally impossible. The current layout is quite tight even with two.

So... Nope

TKS will probably seat three

I will re-purpose the Neptune panel for it.
